data.text: Nuiti ta ɗa ta-vaiti sei kpasu,
Ɛsɛ pɛ ka ɗa ɠisiɛ ga nii kpein é kɛɛzu pagɛ,
Ɗa-vaiti pɛ zɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI yeezu,
Ani kpein kpɛtɛ ungi ɠa ná, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɛ,
Waso nuiti maayo ge la Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɛ,
Faaɠaaza golai ɠa ɗa gba ga nuɓɔɠɔlai ta gaamai,
Nui ziɛ ʋelei a nɛɛna Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɛ,
Fizɔgɛ ani goi nu sɔlɔɔsu, é zɔlɔɔ telebodai zu,
Nui ɠa ɗa faazeikpasui ɠɛ,
Masagi a ɠɛna ɓɔɛa, daawooi ɠa ga GALA gooi,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wɔinʋɛ ga kiloiti ti laazeeliai,
Faa ɲɔu ɠɛɛ vai maayoseɠeʋɛ masagiti bɛ,
Masagi wɔinʋɛ ga naati, niiti ti-laawooiti sɔlegai,
Siɛgi zu masagi yiiɠaawanazu la, ná-ziiɠulagi ɠɛɛʋɛ eɠɛ saa ɠeelai,
Siɛgi zu masagi ɠaazulo pelei ʋasu da, naa ɠa é ga zɛnvui,
Ɠimalai zɔlɔɔ fai vizɔgɛ zanu kitei ɠaalɛ ba vai ʋa,
Sɔle nuiti ta-ʋelei ɠa é ga, è ʋoluave faa ɲɔi ʋa,
Wasogi ɠa a ɗa ʋa ga nu ɠoloɠolo fai,
Fizɔgɛ nu ɓɔɠɔmaayei, wa ɓɔɠɔmaayei nuiti,
Zɔi é ɠidaazu kala gooiti bu,16:20 Zɔi é ɠidaazu kala gooiti bu: Tati pelei taɠiligaa ɓalaa ka ga niiti: zɔi é ga kidafaawu nui ɓaa zɔi é woilosu GALA daawooi ma naa ɠa undaanɛɛi zɔlɔɔ,
Zɔi é ga ɠima nui ziimaʋɛ, naa ɠa ta ɗa ɠɛ ma, keleɠele nui,
Ɠimalai ɠa ɗa zɛnvui ve naati zea, niiti ti ziɛzu la,
Ni ɠimalai ɠa nui yiimaʋɛ, toɠa ɗa ɓɔɛ ga kidafaawui,
Kpɔɛ ʋagɔiti kɛɛʋɛ eɠɛ kɔin gulɔi,
Ta ɠa ná, siɛ ʋelei zɔlegai gaazu,
Pului ɠa ɗa ɠɛ ga botiɠɛ nui ná-kpɔbai,
Nu ɲakai ɠa ɗa faa ɲɔi ɠɛʋele ɓɛtɛ,
Yaava nui ɠa ɗa kpɔɛiti teʋe,
Suɲɔu nui ɠa ɗa seiɲɔɠɔi yaava,
Zɔi é ɠaazuʋɛɛzu ma ga é ɠisiɛ yaava ɠɛɛ vaiti su,
Undeɠa ɠolegiti ta ga lɛbiya wɔɔlɔgi,
Zɔi zii la ɠula fala, naa vizɔgɛ kɔɔɠuluɓai ʋa,
Ta ɗa kpakutoomai ɠɛ ga, ti ʋelela ʋele vaiti kwɛɛ,
